messages.subject: JOY! :-)
messages.msgSnippet: Sarah s guitar arrived today (a birthday gift). She is in her room with it right now and she is SO happy- just BEAMING from ear to ear over her emerald green
messages.messageBody:
Sarah's guitar arrived today (a birthday gift). She is in her room with it right now and she is SO happy- just BEAMING from ear to ear over her emerald green guitar! I'm so glad I took the time to find one in her favorite color (not that it was hard, but I coulda just picked up any old thing, you know?) for her enjoyment!

Mine is coming on Thursday, and I'm looking forward to sharing this learning to play the guitar process with Sarah! Logan is now saying he wants one, so I'll look for one for him - his birthday is next month! (I'd been planning on drums for him)

Beth


Sing, Dance, Laugh...LOVE!
